name: trinket tower
description:
ragdoll town is in danger! tabby the ragdoll must climb trinket tower to defeat the evil that stole all of the town of ragdoll's stuffing.

you must battle against hostile toy enemies, equipped only with the dice you find in the tower.  each floor has a plastic treasure chest with a randomly generated die that is added to your collection.

try to reach the top of the tower where the evil lurks

move - arrow keys

interact - spacebar

click the big green button to roll your dice!

  • dice rolling combat
  • procedurally generated levels
  • handcrafted music + pixel art
  • 6 lovable toy enemies
  • 1 unlovable toy enemy
  • intense giant plastic baby action

a game made for gmtk jam 2022

a wormpod and cilerba game!

jade- programming + sound design

max- programming + art

lyle- art
